title: 2D Canvas — Arc Tool, Eraser, Mirror Symmetry
focus: All criteria met — arc tool, eraser tool, mirror symmetry, and tool switching all implemented and verified

criteria.text: Arc tool draws arcs from 3 points
criteria.notes: arc_from_3_points() with circumscribed_circle computation, collinear fallback to straight line, 3-click workflow with preview

criteria.text: Eraser tool removes strokes or segments

criteria.text: Mirror symmetry toggle reflects drawing across axis
